body_html:
@aitaoquanyi And it may be related the TDR settings on Windows.
Since there is a timeout for driver operation, drivers will get shutdown when it exceeds the timeout. You can try modifying this according to here.

@aitaoquanyi And it may be related the TDR settings on Windows.
Since there is a timeout for driver operation, drivers will get shutdown when it exceeds the timeout. You can try modifying this according to here.
body:
@aitaoquanyi And it may be related the TDR settings on Windows. 
 Since there is a timeout for driver operation, drivers will get shutdown when it exceeds the timeout. You can try modifying this according to [here](https://www.pugetsystems.com/labs/hpc/Working-around-TDR-in-Windows-for-a-better-GPU-computing-experience-777/).
